DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Oral Supplementation Vitamin D Reduce Hypersecretion Parathyroid Hormone Insulin Resistance Obese Chinese Males . Protocol : Weekly oral supplementation 50,000 IU vitamin D ( cholecalciferol ) eight week obese male compare normal-weight male . Index measure conduct baseline endpoint .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Supplementation Obese Chinese Males
DOC.criteria: body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 28kg/m2 18.5 ≤ BMI < 24 ( kg/m2 ) non vegetarian Han Chinese smoke , drink , take vitamin D supplement > 2 fast serum glucose < 7.0 mmol/L serum glucose 2 hr 75 g oral glucose load < 11.1 mmol/L normal function liver kidney evaluate alkaline phosphatase , aspartate aminotransferase , creatinine , uric acid match inclusion criterion diagnose organic disease exclude
